it.polimi.ma.group10.trump.model.game

Class Dealer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ma.group10.trump.model.game.Dealer

  • public class Dealer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a real dealer in a real game, it prepares the match shuffling the deck and distributing cards, it distributes the cards, it declares every round winner and, gives him the won cards, it declares the match winner.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Player declareRoundWinner()
      This method is charged to find the round winner following the game rules
      Player declareWinner()
      This method is charged, at the end of the match, to compare the two players points and to declare the winner according to the game rules
      void distributeCards()
      This method is charged to distribute the cards to the player for the next round: the first card is given to the one that won the previous round, the second to the other player
      static Dealer getInstance()
      This method is charged to return the only instance inside the game of the Dealer, following the Singleton design pattern
      void initializeMatch()
      This method initialize the match according to the game rules: once the deck is created and shuffled, the starting player is chosen, the cards are distributed beginning from the starting player, one each player, the trump is set and the rest of the deck is placed on the table
      void resetGame()
      This method is charged to reset the Game once a match is over

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Dealer getInstance()
        This method is charged to return the only instance inside the game of the Dealer, following the Singleton design pattern
        Returns:
        the Dealer instance

      • initializeMatch

        public void initializeMatch()
                     throws DeckException
        This method initialize the match according to the game rules: once the deck is created and shuffled, the starting player is chosen, the cards are distributed beginning from the starting player, one each player, the trump is set and the rest of the deck is placed on the table
        Throws:
        DeckException - if the deck is wrongly initialized

      • declareRoundWinner

        public Player declareRoundWinner()
                          throws DealerException
        This method is charged to find the round winner following the game rules
        Returns:
        the Player who won the round
        Throws:
        DealerException - if the preconditions to declare the round winner are not met

      • distributeCards

        public void distributeCards()
                     throws DeckException,
                            DealerException
        This method is charged to distribute the cards to the player for the next round: the first card is given to the one that won the previous round, the second to the other player
        Throws:
        DeckException - if there are still cards on the table, so the previous round is not yet over
        DealerException - if a player is not in an optimal situation to get the new card

      • declareWinner

        public Player declareWinner()
                     throws DealerException
        This method is charged, at the end of the match, to compare the two players points and to declare the winner according to the game rules
        Returns:
        the Player won the match or null in case of DRAW
        Throws:
        DealerException - if the preconditions to perform this task are not met

      • resetGame

        public void resetGame()
        This method is charged to reset the Game once a match is over
